reasoning: CCM3 is a specific genetic subtype caused by PDCD10 gene mutations, one of three CCM genes (CCM1/KRIT1, CCM2, CCM3/PDCD10). CCM3 represents ~10-15% of familial CCM cases. With overall familial CCM birth incidence <0.1 per 100k, CCM3 incidence is <0.01 per 100k. Limited population-based data for specific genetic subtypes.
